titles: A true copie of the letter from the Committee and Estates of the Parliament of Scotland inviting his highnesse the Prince of Wales, to come and remaine in Scotland, or with the Scotch army, now in England.
author: Scotland. Parliament. Committee of Estates.
notes: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
